description:
Bjorn is a pint-sized guy packed full of muscles. He was a referral from Vander, who I think did some taste-testing before sending him to me. So Bjorn came with the official "Vander Seal of Approval!"
He is a gay guy who likes being a smaller dude. I think his size goes great with his passive nature. He loves to bottom and be dominated, and for a small dude, he can handle some really big meat!
Bjorn clearly spends a lot of time in the gym, and is working on his personal training certification. He is all natural, including his awesome body hair. He also spends a lot of his time taking care of some ailing relatives, so has bit of nursing streak in him.
For this solo, he is a little unsure where to look and how to play to the cameras, but he stays hard. I think the most notable thing about his solo is he actually purrs! Maybe it's not a purr. Could be a growl? But it is dang sexy, so listen for it!
And the big finale is awesome! He gets himself at an inverted angle to help ensure that he gives himself a facial. He normally shoots past his head, so having to be totally upside down wasn't need. Laser beams of cum shoot out, coating his body and face! Heck, he even coats the bed behind his head!
He looks extremely satisfied after giving himself a facial! You will be too!
title: Bjorn - Solo
